content: Yes, the combat in the previous game was praised by critics and gamers alike for its smooth and satisfying mechanics. The game provided a mix of melee weapon combat and magical attacks, which allowed players to customize their playstyle according to their preferences. It's likely that the new game will build upon the existing combat system, adding new weapons, abilities, and challenges to keep things fresh and exciting. In addition, with the game taking place in a new setting - Norse mythology, it's possible that there will be new enemies and challenges that will require players to adapt their tactics.
